name: Alter Self
description: You assume a different form. Choose one option: change your appearance (including height/weight within 1 foot, same limb arrangement); gain natural weapons (1d6 bludgeoning/piercing/slashing, using spellcasting mod for attack/damage, magical); or adapt to an aquatic environment (swim speed equal to walking speed and breathe underwater). Physical inspection reveals the illusion if scrutinized.

effects.description: Choose one: reshape appearance (same limb layout, +/-1 foot height/size); gain magical natural weapons (1d6, choose damage type) using spellcasting ability; or gain swim speed = walk speed and breathe underwater. Physical inspection can reveal the illusion.
